entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
